_sText:
This is a pushing combine prefab that can be used to block doors or use man of them in a line do block a huge area.

To make the combine be unkillable:
Select the Inviable brush, it is the only func_breakable. and set the flag: Only break on Trigger

Here is a video to show how it works!

<object width="480" height="295"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/1o3M_Yzwxt8&hl=en_US&fs=1&color1=0x006699&color2=0x54abd6"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/1o3M_Yzwxt8&hl=en_US&fs=1&color1=0x006699&color2=0x54abd6" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="480" height="295"></embed></object>
